subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets’ frontcourt was pitted against the indomitable pillars Shaquille O’Neal and Amare Stoudemire of the Phoenix Suns in a sobering loss at the Izod Center.
snippet: The Nets’ frontcourt was pitted against the indomitable pillars Shaquille O’Neal and Amare Stoudemire of the Phoenix Suns in a sobering loss at the Izod Center.
